mapper.select: select p_city,sum(p_price*r_personnel) money from t_reserve r,t_product p where r.p_code=p.p_code group by p_city order by p_city
select nvl(sum(p_price*r_personnel),0) money from t_product p,t_reserve c where p.p_code=c.p_code and u_id=#{u_id}

select r_id,u.u_id,u.u_name,p.p_img,p.p_content, p.p_code,p_city,r_personnel,p_price,p_date ,p_price*r_personnel money from t_user u,t_reserve r,t_product p where u.u_id=r.u_id and p.p_code=r.p_code and u.u_id=#{u_id}
